**[Recall Knowledge - Humanoid](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)** ([Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=14)): DC 41 **[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 39 **[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 36 [Promise Guard](/NPCs.aspx?ID=1590) **Source** [Pathfinder #150: Broken Promises](/Sources.aspx?ID=15) pg. 29 **Perception** +29 **Languages** [Common](/Languages.aspx?ID=1), [Draconic](/Languages.aspx?ID=2) **Skills** [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +33, [Diplomacy](/Skills.aspx?ID=6) +30, [Hermea Lore](/Skills.aspx?ID=8) +33, [Intimidation](/Skills.aspx?ID=7) +33, [Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=14) +30, [Survival](/Skills.aspx?ID=16) +28 **Str** +8 **Dex** +2 **Con** +9 **Int** +2 **Wis** +3 **Cha** +2 **Items** _+2 [greater striking](/Equipment.aspx?ID=280) [longsword](/Weapons.aspx?ID=31)_, _+2 [greater resilient](/Equipment.aspx?ID=279) [full plate](/Armor.aspx?ID=13)_, [_greater sturdy shield_](/Equipment.aspx?ID=327) (Hardness 15, HP 120, BT 60), _+2 [striking](/Equipment.aspx?ID=280) [composite shortbow](/Weapons.aspx?ID=75)_ (20 arrows), _[potion of flying](/Equipment.aspx?ID=189)_ --- **AC** 43 (45 with shield raised) **Fort** +32 **Ref** +26 **Will** +29 **HP** 330 **Promise Guard Stance** A Promise guard always has their shield raised as if they had used the [Raise a Shield](/Actions.aspx?ID=98) action, as long as they meet that action's requirements.
**Shield Warden** A Promise guard can use their [Shield Block](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=32) reaction to prevent damage to an adjacent ally.
**[Attack of Opportunity](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=3)** A Promise guard can use Attack of Opportunity when a creature within their reach uses a [concentrate](/Traits.aspx?ID=32) action, in addition to its normal trigger. They can disrupt triggering concentrate actions, and they disrupt actions on any hit, not just a critical hit.
**[Shield Block](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=32)** --- **Speed** 30 feet **Melee** _longsword_ +38 ([Magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103), [versatile P](/Traits.aspx?ID=200)), **Damage** 7d8+8 slashing **Ranged** _composite shortbow_ +36 ([deadly 3d10](/Traits.aspx?ID=174), [Magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103), [Propulsive](/Traits.aspx?ID=191), [range increment 60 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=248), [reload 0](/Traits.aspx?ID=254)), **Damage** 4d8+8 piercing **Shield Shove** The Promise guard makes a Strike with their longsword, then attempts to push the target back. If the Strike hits, the target is [flat-footed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=16) until the start of the guard's next turn, and the guard can automatically [Shove](/Actions.aspx?ID=38) the target, with the same benefits as the Shove action (including the critical success effect if the Strike was a critical hit). If the guard moves to follow the target, this movement doesn't trigger reactions. In addition, if the target has to stop moving because it would hit an object, it takes damage equal to the guard's Strength modifier. **Sudden Charge** The Promise guard Strides up to double their Speed. If the guard ends their movement within melee reach of at least one enemy, they can make a melee Strike against that enemy.
name: Promise Guard
